thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 8 of 235
thread.title: Judi

author: Judi
title: Judi
text: I love to shop Groupon. You're always there for me. Some glitches in combining searches and shopping carts when I break up my shopping over a few days might have cost you a few hundred dollars from me. I don't want to scatter my purchases out, like the free shipping, like to use one coupon, but when I shop via different specials that come up in my email at different times, can't seem to combine the shopping carts. So, I tend to walk away. But, I love you anyway. Thanks!
